text: Hi Jatin, Make sure you have the Transactional Email Add-On that is available with marketing Hub Professional plan. <https://www.HubSpot.com/pricing/marketing/starter?term=annual&products=marketing-hub-professional_1&products=transactional-email_1|HubSpot pricing>

More info on how to create a single send api email on: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/how-to-use-transactional-email-in-HubSpot|How to use>  and <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/marketing/transactional-emails|Api docs>
Does anybody have a good solution for migrating data from Zendesk to HubSpot, a third party service would be ideal as we would need to do a lot of data mapping?
